meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an ambassador.
meanings.sent1: The ambassadorial meeting was held in a grand hall.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ambassadorial outfit to the diplomatic event.
meanings.sent3: The ambassadorial cat greeted the guests at the embassy.
meanings.sent4: His ambassadorial demeanor made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The ambassadorial speech was eloquent and persuasive.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the work or duties of an ambassador.
meanings.sent1: The ambassadorial duties included attending official functions.
meanings.sent2: He received an ambassadorial appointment to a foreign country.
meanings.sent4: Her ambassadorial responsibilities required tact and diplomacy.
meanings.sent5: The ambassadorial role demanded constant travel and representation.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of an ambassador.
meanings.sent1: She possessed an ambassadorial grace in her interactions.
meanings.sent2: His ambassadorial skills helped in resolving conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The ambassadorial smile on her face put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent4: His ambassadorial charm won over the foreign delegates.
meanings.sent5: The ambassadorial presence at the event added prestige and honor.
